featured.text: Such dimples are not a permanent trait, for they vanish when the excessive fat goes away.
We eat polluted dairy products and meat and take the dioxin into our bodies, where it is stored in our fat for years and builds up over time.
Sitting for too long slows down the body’s metabolism and the way enzymes break down our fat reserves, raising both blood sugar levels and blood pressure.
Various studies have been _____ in this hospital to explore the link between a high-fat diet and cancer.

other.text: As they grow older and lose their baby fat, the dimples may 38 with time.
Not all dimples are formed by a genetic defect, though; some may appear due to the 36 of excessive fat on the face.

definition.zh_def: 脂肪，通常指身體內的脂肪組織或食物中的脂肪成分。
definition.en_def: A natural oily substance found in animal bodies, often used to store energy.
definition.example: He decided to cut down on fat in his diet to improve his health.
